custom_params.label: SAW
custom_params.tooltip: Saw-like harmonic morph (k^1.96 curve, all harmonics)

custom_params.label: SQR
custom_params.tooltip: Square-like harmonic morph (k^1.96 curve, odd harmonics emphasized)

custom_params.label: MIX
custom_params.tooltip: Blend SAW (left) and SQR (right) harmonic structures

custom_params.label: SAT
custom_params.tooltip: h3/h4 bump intensity (Gaussian peak at n=3.54)
